articles.title: Artificial Intelligence' Play Differently Today?
articles.summary: Let's revisit the AI classic, in an age where AI itself has become a buzzword.
articles.translated_summary: Let's revisit the AI classic, in an age where AI itself has become a buzzword.

articles.title: Why the Best AI Films Don’t Feel Artificial at All
articles.summary: No matter how far AI advances, film production will always be driven by visionaries with stories to tell.
articles.translated_title: Why the Best AI Films Don’t Feel Artificial at All

articles.title: Top Silicon Valley exec reveals the ‘stupidest thing’ companies adopting AI can do
articles.summary: The president of Cisco rejects the doomsday warnings from some tech leaders that artificial intelligence will make entry-level jobs vanish.
articles.translated_title: Top Silicon Valley exec reveals the ‘stupidest thing’ companies adopting AI can do
articles.translated_summary: The president of Cisco rejects the doomsday warnings from some tech leaders that artificial intelligence will make entry-level jobs vanish.

articles.title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman expects to spend ‘trillions’ on infrastructure
articles.summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman wants to spend trillions of dollars over time on the infrastructure required to develop and run artificial intelligence services. He just needs to figure out a way to raise that kind of money.
articles.translated_title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman expects to spend ‘trillions’ on infrastructure
articles.translated_summary: OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman wants to spend trillions of dollars over time on the infrastructure required to develop and run artificial intelligence services. He just needs to figure out a way to raise that kind of money.

articles.title: Meta’s superintelligence dream team will be management challenge of the century
articles.summary: Meta is spending a fortune to assemble the brightest minds in artificial intelligence. Research suggests that packing a team with too much genius can backfire.

articles.title: Murder case in Australia reveals AI-generated mishap
articles.summary: An Australian lawyer filed submissions in a murder case that included incorrect information generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Murder case in Australia reveals AI-generated mishap
articles.translated_summary: An Australian lawyer filed submissions in a murder case that included incorrect information generated by artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Australian lawyer sorry for AI errors in murder case, including fake quotes and made up cases
articles.summary: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Australian lawyer sorry for AI errors in murder case, including fake quotes and made up cases
articles.translated_summary: A senior lawyer in Australia has apologized to a judge for filing submissions in a murder case that included fake quotes and nonexistent case judgments generated by artificial intelligence.
